about_the_game:
Greetings MechWarrior,
Legendary Mechs are here! Presenting the Timber Wolf "Howl" Legendary Mech and Mini Battle Pass. Legendary Mechs have unique hard points, quirks, and a 30% C-Bill boost! Playing the Legendary Mech will unlock rewards from the Mini Battle Pass which includes unique in-game customization items, in-game currency, boosters, and consumables.
Become a Legend in MechWarrior Online!

The Legendary Mech Pack includes instant unlock!
  • Timber Wolf TBR-H(LGD) - Howl - Mech with a 30% C-Bill Boost
  • 1 Mech bay
  • The Howl Title
  • The Howl Badge


What is unlocked in the Mini Battle Pass?
New in-game Items
  • 3 x Howl Standing Cockpit items
  • 3 x Howl Mounted Warhorn Cockpit items
  • 3 x Howl Hanging Cockpit items (with a 5% boost)
  • Howl Badge as a Decal
  • Bonus Decal
  • New Howl Color
  • Howl Bolt-on

Currency, Boosters, and Consumables
  • 3000 MC
  • 7 Million C-Bills
  • 100 GSP
  • 7 days Active Premium Time x 2
  • 100 UAV Consumables


Mini FAQ

Can you Buy the Legendary Mech pack more than once?

  • You can only purchase the Legendary Mech Pack once on Steam.

How do I unlock items in the Mini Battle Pass?

  • You can unlock the Mini Battle Pass by playing the Mech included in the Legendary Mech Pack.

Do I have to claim the items in the Mini Battle Pass?

  • The Mini Battle Pass items will need to be redeemed on the Legendary Mech Purchase page and added to your account as you unlock the Mini Battle Pass Tiers.

When does the Mini Battle Pass end?

  • The Mini Battle Pass does not expire. You can unlock the Mini Battle Pass at any time once you purchase the Legendary Mech Pack.

Where can I view, track, and redeem my Mini Battle Pass progress?

  • You can track your progress on the Legends DLC Page on the MechWarrior Online Website
